text: And those who believe and perform righteous deeds We shall surely lodge them We shall give them residence a variant reading has nuthwiyannahum derived from thawā’ ‘residence’; the transitive link to the indirect object ghurafan is made without the preposition fī ‘in’ in lofty abodes of Paradise underneath which rivers flow to abide decreed for them to live forever in them — excellent is this reward as the reward of the toilers;
